comments: I.e., Hosoya index of the n-hypercube graph Q_n. - _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jul 11 2011a(4) = A033532(1), a(5) = A033532(2).a(3) = A033516(2) = A033535(2). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 09 2013

example: From _Max Alekseyev_, Nov 16 2009: (Start)E.g. for n=2, we have1 matching of size 0 (i.e. the empty matching)4 matchings of size 1 (i.e. an edge)2 matchings of size 2 (that are the perfect matchings).So a(2) = 1 + 4 + 2 = 7, whereas A005271(2) = 2. (End)
author: _Per H. Lundow_
